msg: just need some minor grammars corrections and coloring some terms as Java Guide

author: roberto
msg: > Updated NUnit Oracle SqlMaps to remove exceptions fixed by new resultMap "type" attribute
> Updated (fix for Oracle) DBHelperParameterCache to check if first parameter is a ReturnValue before removing parameter
> Updated (fix for Oracle) PreparedStatementFactory to check if parameterName starts with parameterPrefix before removing prefix length from parameterName
> Updated NUnit Oracle SqlMaps for stored procedure updates and fixes
> Updated NUnit Oracle stored procedure test name
> Updated NUnit Oracle db stored procedure scripts since they were not compiling properly previously with tabs/newlines (need to address stored proc script tabs/newlines in ScriptRunner later on)

author: gilles
msg: - Added a nunit category "MTS" so you can skip the TransactionScope test if you want
- Added "type" attribut on ResultMap so you can specify a CLR Type (a type alias) --> this must fix oracle decimal issue

author: gilles
msg: - Improved LazyLoading process to return the real object after a proxy call to a property
- Back to NHibernate 0.4 to test with ByteFx provider
(My patch to the the MysSql team for their current provider must be included in the next version)
